overview:
Having co-founded Punch Communications in 2003, Pete has fifteen years experience in UK and European Public Relations and an enviable base of media contacts in highly diverse sectors.

With a wealth of communications expertise spanning Consumer, Corporate, Trade and Business-to-Business sectors, he has devised and managed national and international media campaigns for global blue-chip businesses â€“ these have included Microsoft, Direct Line, Boeing & Sony PlayStation, each of which has taken advantage of his talent for clear and concise communication.

Pete also has considerable experience and personal passion for the technology sector having launched and nurtured some of the UKâ€™s most durable and successful internet brands through the European dotcom boom - including FT.com, Excite, LetsBuyIt and lastminute.com.
